description: Expand the application to encapsulate physician-level medical understanding with extensive AI integration covering physiology, anatomy, pathology, and diagnostics. Make complex medical knowledge intuitively accessible to users.

phases.name: Clinical Reasoning Engine
phases.description: Build the foundation for clinical thinking - differential diagnosis, red flags, and decision support

userStories.title: Differential Diagnosis Data Model
userStories.description: Create comprehensive data structures for symptoms, conditions, and their probabilistic relationships
acceptanceCriteria: Define Symptom interface with characteristics (onset, duration, severity, modifiers)
Define Condition interface with diagnostic criteria, prevalence, red flags
Include demographic modifiers (age, sex, risk factors)

userStories.title: Differential Diagnosis Generator
userStories.description: AI-powered system to generate ranked differential diagnoses from symptom input
acceptanceCriteria: Input: array of symptoms with characteristics
Output: ranked list of possible conditions with probabilities
Use Bayesian reasoning with prior probabilities
LLM enhancement for nuanced clinical reasoning

userStories.title: Red Flag Detection System
userStories.description: Identify dangerous symptom patterns requiring immediate medical attention
acceptanceCriteria: Define red flag patterns for major emergencies (MI, stroke, PE, sepsis, etc.)
Clear actionable guidance for each red flag
Never replace emergency services - always advise seeking care

userStories.title: Clinical Decision Tree Visualizer
userStories.description: Interactive visualization of diagnostic reasoning pathways
acceptanceCriteria: Show branching based on symptom presence/absence
Explain why each branch is relevant

userStories.title: Clinical Reasoning Chat Mode
userStories.description: Enhance AI chat with structured clinical reasoning capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Chat can ask clarifying questions in clinical style

phases.name: Diagnostic Intelligence System
phases.description: Lab interpretation, diagnostic algorithms, and test recommendations

userStories.title: Lab Value Interpretation Engine
userStories.description: Comprehensive lab test interpretation with clinical context
acceptanceCriteria: Database of 200+ common lab tests with reference ranges
Pattern recognition (anemia panels, liver panels, etc.)

userStories.title: Diagnostic Algorithm Library
userStories.description: Interactive evidence-based diagnostic algorithms
acceptanceCriteria: Implement 20+ common diagnostic algorithms (chest pain, syncope, etc.)
Show evidence basis for each step

userStories.title: Test Recommendation Engine
userStories.description: Suggest appropriate diagnostic tests based on clinical picture
acceptanceCriteria: Explain what each test would reveal

userStories.title: Lab Results Dashboard
userStories.description: Visual dashboard for tracking and understanding lab results
acceptanceCriteria: Input lab values manually or from health records

phases.name: Pathophysiology Visualization
phases.description: Deep dive into disease mechanisms at cellular and system levels

userStories.title: Disease Mechanism Visualizer
userStories.description: Animated visualizations of how diseases develop and progress

userStories.title: Body System Cascade Effects
userStories.description: Show how dysfunction in one system affects others

userStories.title: Drug Mechanism Animations
userStories.description: Visualize how medications work at molecular level

userStories.title: Cellular Pathology Viewer
userStories.description: Microscopic view of disease effects on cells and tissues

phases.name: Treatment Intelligence
phases.description: Evidence-based treatment recommendations and drug management

userStories.title: Treatment Recommendation Engine
userStories.description: AI-powered evidence-based treatment suggestions
acceptanceCriteria: Output: treatment options with evidence levels

userStories.title: Drug Interaction Checker
userStories.description: Comprehensive drug-drug and drug-condition interaction checking

userStories.title: Dosage Calculator
userStories.description: Calculate appropriate medication dosages

userStories.title: Treatment Timeline Planner
userStories.description: Visual timeline for treatment plans and medication schedules

phases.name: Patient Education Generator
phases.description: Tools for understanding and communicating health information

userStories.title: Health Literacy Analyzer
userStories.description: Assess and adapt content to user's health literacy level
acceptanceCriteria: Detect user's comprehension level from interactions

userStories.title: Condition Explanation Generator
userStories.description: Generate personalized condition explanations
acceptanceCriteria: Analogies and metaphors for complex concepts

userStories.title: Medication Guide Generator
userStories.description: Create personalized medication information sheets
acceptanceCriteria: Purpose and mechanism in plain language

userStories.title: Lifestyle Recommendation Engine
userStories.description: Personalized lifestyle and prevention recommendations
acceptanceCriteria: Based on conditions and risk factors

phases.name: Clinical Case Simulator
phases.description: Interactive learning through clinical case studies

userStories.title: Case Presentation System
userStories.description: Present clinical cases in realistic format
acceptanceCriteria: Library of 100+ clinical cases across specialties
History, physical exam, labs, imaging stages

userStories.title: Diagnosis Practice Mode
userStories.description: Interactive diagnosis practice with feedback

userStories.title: Treatment Decision Simulator
userStories.description: Practice treatment decisions with outcomes
acceptanceCriteria: Show simulated outcomes based on choices

userStories.title: Learning Assessment Dashboard
userStories.description: Track learning progress and identify gaps

phases.name: Advanced AI Medical Reasoning
phases.description: Sophisticated AI capabilities for medical understanding

userStories.title: Medical Reasoning Chain
userStories.description: Transparent step-by-step medical reasoning
acceptanceCriteria: Show complete reasoning chain for conclusions

userStories.title: Personalized Health Insights
userStories.description: AI-generated insights from user's health data
acceptanceCriteria: Identify correlations user may not notice

userStories.title: Medical Question Answering
userStories.description: Answer complex medical questions with citations

userStories.title: Health Risk Modeling
userStories.description: Predictive modeling for health risks
